summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3205, for the improvement of the alley in block 40, A. A. Denny's Addition, being the alley between Western Avenue and 1st Avenue and extending from Blanchard Street to Bell Street, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 39613 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
